---
title: Stability study
---


```{r}
library("ggplot2")
library("readr")
library("dplyr")
library("stringr")
library("yaml")
```

```{r}
conf <- yaml.load_file("../conf/train.yaml")
conf$features_dir <- paste0("../", conf$features_dir)

z <- read_csv(conf$features_dir) %>%
  select(-X1) %>%
  select(path, y, everything())
z$ix <- str_extract(z$path, "[0-9]+") %>%
  as.integer()

Xy <- read_csv(file.path(data_dir, "Xy.csv"))

heatmap(cor(Xy[z$ix, ], z[, 3:65]))
hist(cor(z$y, z[, 3:65]), 20)
plot(Xy$y[z$ix], z$y)
```
